thread.section_title: American Freight Furniture & Mattress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Freight Furniture & Mattress | americanfreight.us
thread.title: Bob B.
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Bob B.

author: Bob B.
title: Bob B.
text: About 3 weeks ago we purchased a rake trundle bed from American Freight. Recently we found a crack on one of the support rails. I called the manufacture and they said I had to go thru American Freight to get the warrantee work done and it was covered and would replace it. I contacted the manager Randy L. and he was most helpful and replaced it on the spot which he did not have to do. I will continue to do business in the future because of the way I was treated. Bob B. Cottageville, SC
